itunes:title: Backlist Books We've Been Meaning to Read and (Finally) Did!
title: Backlist Books We've Been Meaning to Read and (Finally) Did!
description:
In Episode 17 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee are sharing some backlist books they've recently read! They share what they're loving lately, their latest reads, a shelf addition, and have book talk about backlist books that they've recently enjoyed and you might have missed.

*Support us on Patreon ! We would love for you to join our Book Talk community! We have great bonus content including bonus episodes, Zoom get togethers, an engaging private Facebook group to interact with other listeners and more for just $5 a month!Â 

Â *The book titles listed are linked to Amazon Affiliates, where we make a small commission from qualifying purchases (at no cost to you). Thanks for your support!


Loving Lately
4:00 The Chair on Netflix (Tina)
6:40 Bookstagram (Renee)
Tina's Bookstagram article

Latest Reads
12:40 Once There Were Wolves | Charlotte McConaghy (T)
16:46 The Other Me | Sarah Zachrich Jeng (R)
22:00 Billy Summers | Stephen King (both)

Book Talk
26:42 What does backlist mean?
36:00 The Kind Worth Killing | Peter Swanson (T)
39:29 The Selection |Kiera Cass (R)
44:43 Night Music | JoJo Moyes (T)
49:12 Untamed | Glennon Doyle (R)
55:25 Beach Read| Emily Henry (T)
59:23 Hamnet | Maggie O'Farrell (R)

Shelf Additions
1:02:15 The Royals Next Door | Karina Halle (T)
1:05:44 Come to the Edge | Christina Haig (R)

Other Mentions
Katie @basicbsguide on Instagram
Kelly @dearmrhemingway on Instagram
Katie @Katieladyreads on Instagram

Love audiobooks like we do? Head to Libro.fm where you can find your next must listen audiobook, gift a membership to someone special, and support your favorite Independent Bookstore! *link is an affiliate in which we earn a small commission at no cost to you

Connect with us on social media! On Instagram, Tina @Tbretc, Renee Â @Itsbooktalk, and the podcast is @booktalketc

You can also email us directly at booktalketc@gmail.com.
